author: Brady Dennis
title: ‘It’s going to get bad’: As outbreak surges, nation faces tough start to a grim week - The Washington Post
description: ‘It’s going to get bad’: As outbreak surges, nation faces tough start to a grim week The Washington Post
content:
As the number of confirmed cases of covid-19 exploded across the country and the world lawmakers on Capitol Hill spent much of the day locked in a bitter stalemate, unable to finalize the outlines of a $2 trillion stimulus package.
The Federal Reserve again … [+9342 chars]
